a.description: The hand makes a fist with the thumb on the side. Only the thumb moves to the side of the index finger.

b.description: The hand is held up with the palm facing forward, the fingers extended and close together, and the thumb tucked against the palm.

c.description: The hand forms a 'C' shape with the fingers and thumb curved and separated.

d.description: The index finger points up with the other fingers and thumb curled into the palm.

e.description: The hand makes a claw-like shape with all fingers bent at the knuckles.

f.description: The index finger and thumb form a circle, with the other fingers extended upward.

g.description: The index finger and thumb form an 'L' shape, with the index finger pointing forward and the thumb pointing up.

h.description: The index and middle fingers are extended and held together, pointing forward.

i.description: The hand forms a fist with only the pinky finger extended upward.

j.description: The hand forms a fist with only the pinky finger extended, then draws a 'J' in the air.

k.description: The index and middle fingers are extended and separated, with the thumb touching the middle finger.

l.description: The index finger and thumb form an 'L' shape, with the index finger pointing up and the thumb pointing to the side.

m.description: The hand forms a fist with the thumb tucked between the ring and pinky fingers.

n.description: The hand forms a fist with the thumb tucked between the middle and ring fingers.

o.description: The fingers and thumb form a circle shape.

p.description: The index, middle, and thumb form a 'K' shape, and then the hand points downward.

q.description: The index and thumb form a 'G' shape, and then the hand points downward.

r.description: The index and middle fingers are crossed with the thumb tucked in.

s.description: The hand forms a fist with the thumb wrapped over the fingers.

t.description: The hand forms a fist with the thumb between the index and middle fingers.

u.description: The index and middle fingers are extended and held together, pointing up.

v.description: The index and middle fingers form a 'V' shape, pointing up.

w.description: The index, middle, and ring fingers form a 'W' shape, pointing up.

x.description: The index finger is bent at the knuckle, forming a hook-like shape.

y.description: The hand forms a fist with only the pinky and thumb extended, like a 'hang loose' gesture.

z.description: The index finger traces a 'Z' in the air.

0.description: The fingers and thumb form a circle.

1.description: The index finger points up with the rest of the fingers and thumb folded.

2.description: The index and middle fingers are extended, forming a 'V'.

3.description: The thumb, index, and middle fingers are extended.

4.description: Four fingers are extended with the thumb folded.

5.description: All five fingers are extended, like a high five.

6.description: The thumb and pinky touch while the other fingers are extended.

7.description: The thumb, index, middle finger, and ring finger are extended.

8.description: The thumb, index, middle, ring, and pinky fingers form a specific shape.

9.description: The index finger is hooked and the other fingers are held down.

hello.description: The hand starts near the forehead and moves outward, like a salute.

thank you.description: The flat hand starts at the chin and moves outward and down.

please.description: The flat hand rubs in a circular motion on the chest.

yes.description: The hand forms a fist and nods up and down, like a head nodding.

no.description: The index and middle fingers snap together against the thumb, like a mouth saying no.

good.description: The flat right hand starts with fingers touching the chin, then moves down and away from the body.

bad.description: The flat right hand starts with fingers touching the chin, then moves down and away from the body with a negative facial expression.

learn.description: The right hand, with fingers grouped and thumb extended, touches the forehead and then moves outward.

school.description: The two 'S' hands (fists with thumbs wrapped over fingers) tap twice on top of each other.

book.description: The two hands open like a book, palms facing up.

read.description: The index and middle fingers of both hands move like scanning across a page.

write.description: The hand mimics holding a pen and writing on the palm of the other hand.

math.description: The index finger of the right hand taps on the forehead.

science.description: The fists with thumbs extended rotate around each other in front of the chest.

d.description: Hand sign for Gujarati letter ડ

bad.description: Hand sign for Gujarati word ખરાબ

learn.description: Hand sign for Gujarati word શીખવું

school.description: Hand sign for Gujarati word શાળા

book.description: Hand sign for Gujarati word પુસ્તક

no.description: Hand sign for Hindi word नहीं

good.description: Hand sign for Hindi word अच्छा
